wikipedia_page.main: James Dewar (12 October 1942 – 16 May 2002) was a Scottish musician best known as the bassist and vocalist for Robin Trower and Stone the Crows, the latter having its beginnings as the resident band at Burns Howff in Glasgow.

response: *Jim Dewar (1942-2002), vocalist and bassist with Robin Trower Band and Stone The Crows
*"Caledonia" (Jim Dewar, Robin Trower) – 3:49 (Robin Trower cover, Japan release only)

Notable former residents of Gallowhill include the actor Gerard Butler Painter Francis Convery, the music manager John Reid, Folk singer and music manager Danny Kyle, footballer James Grady actor and musician Tom Urie and  musician Jim Dewar.
* Jim Dewar (American football) (1922–1989), American football halfback
